cleaned_reviews: mutiara damansara mrt station is a comfortable city transit station with spacious and clean environment it is also equipped with toilet prayer room and lift the mrt station is connected to the shopping malls ikea the curve ipc

the station is very poorly maintained the escalators especially the one with shattered glass panel have not been repaired since the last few times i was here in the span of a month platform is clean and well maintained though

its the main mrt station to go for shopping at mutiara damansara area the station is just a few minutes walk from the curve lotuss mutiara damansara ipc shopping centre ikea mutiara damansara kidzania
wc staff and cleaning work rajin i come look staff so good cleaning

i would rate this station better if they reopened up the bridge tunnel to the curve instead of barricading ecurve just because they wanted to demolish and build the lines condo for an undisclosed amount of time
the drivers never allow us to enter the bus until its time to depart even when its raining
link to the malls ecurve ikea etc could still be improved walking is fine but certain stretch of the journey is not covered and might be troublesome if it rains
good facilities but the bus sometimes not following the time bergerak especially during weekend

access to the curve very poor its changed from walking through the internal bridge to walking out the street instead when its raining you must have umbrella or else you wont be able to walk to the station from the curve

feeder bus fr utama to here need to pay rm after that need to walk up few stories staircase to the station if fr opposite site not convenient for olders and handicap users no lift nor escalator unless they taking the risk to cross over the road
map should have pintu a b and c marked accordingly for pickup and drop off good location for people to shop and work

i am years old last week my wife and i decided to take the mrt from bandar utama to pavilion kuala lumpur when we stepped into the coach we saw two rows of seats occupied by young men and ladies these were priority seats reserved for

so far i have been coming here to work part time for the pass month and so far its been pretty great the station is clean and the train usually takes around mins to arrive to pick me up token machine is very user friendly tho it does
nice spacious good location

generally it serves its intended purpose however the seating furniture at the platform can be a hazard to the commuters those seats come together with a protruded side table and if one is not careful enough or rushing to catch the coach

damn didnt take any photos to share the station is big spacious with a clean toilet very important the mrt arrival times are displayed prominently and surprisingly it was on time the only disappointment was the lack of signage

finally ticket machines dont always work and none of the staff seems to care hunting thru pockets for notes and coins is so old ccs are the only option for payment just watch the queues grow longer while ppl look for correct change

this is where i get off to go to ikea one of my opticians ace hardware big tesco harvey norman popular book store machines burger king cimb and maybank bose used to be in the area but they closed down the store so need to go to
clean convenient easy access to ecurve the curve ikea

great place to have mrt link to ecurve which you can then go to ikea ikano and curve tesco the biggest issue is that there is no link from the bus station servicing this mrt to go into the shopping centers mentioned above staff attitude is rather indifferent clean restrooms and fast mrt trains
near the curve ikea ipc and office building surian tower and the curve hotel too for time being ecurve is closed but the link to the curve is still opened and guarded by auxiliary police

convenient mrt station location just next to the e curve shopping centre and also a little walk away from the ikea and ikano power centre shopping malls bus connectivity is decent with mrt shuttles rapidkl buses and selangor free bus
great station they made minor improvements to show where the proper exits are no escalators up if you are walking from bandar utama but they have a lift and two staircases

watch out for the customer service provided here i had been treated rudely by a staff here its surprised me because how come a customer service staff can say rude stuff to an innocent customer dah pemalas tak reti buat keja lepas tu be rude to customer rapidkl prasarana tak provide proper customer service sop
sign boards can still be improved they are labeled a b c d but is not informational only after you exit the gate i know i took the correct gate to the curve

i transitted both bandar utama and mutiara damansara stations each station is spacious and not crowded on a weekend trains come and go on schedule we had rain in the afternoon a few places at both stations roof were leaking rain water

beautifully designed train station which is attached with some of the best shopping areas in the area where you can find almost everythingyou can enjoy here with your friends and can do endless shopping in the nice beautiful clean and friendly environment

the station links with shopping centers and suria building and hotel the shopping centers include ikea ipc the carve ecarve also you can go to tesco and kidzinia and many others office near by the hotel nearby is royal chualan damansara also you can park in any shopping centers and use mrt
